```{r}
mydata <- read.csv("3.1.txt", sep = ",", header = TRUE)

mytable <- table(mydata$cohort90)
mytable
```
```{r}
prop.table(mytable)
```
```{r}
mytablecomb <- cbind(mytable, prop.table(mytable), cumsum(prop.table(mytable)))
mytablecomb
```
